channel.title: Solution Accelerators | Microsoft US
channel.description: Solution Accelerators are repeatable solutions that can be quickly and easily implemented for specific business outcomes to accelerate transformation journey.

item.title: Solution Accelerators | Microsoft US
item.description: Solution Accelerators are repeatable solutions that can be quickly and easily implemented for specific business outcomes to accelerate transformation journey.

item.title: Hands-On-Lab- Azure Purview Workshop
item.description: Hands-on-Lab to explore the functionality of Azure Purview, a unified data governance service that helps you manage and govern your on-premises, multi-cloud and software-as-a-service (SaaS) data.

item.title: Reusable Technology Accelerator- Azure Purview Demo Generator
item.description: Automate the deployment of a pre-populated Azure Purview demo environment.

item.title: Hands-On-Lab- Azure Cognitive Search Hands-On-Lab
item.description: Self-paced workshop that teaches you everything you need to know to get up and running with Azure Cognitive Search quickly.

item.title: Solution Accelerator- Workplace Intelligence for Product Development Teams
item.description: Uncover and leverage the key drivers of productivity and success for product development teams

item.title: Solution Accelerator- Workplace Intelligence for Human Resources
item.description: Easily identify factors that influence productivity and engagement

item.title: Reusable Technology Accelerator- Virtual Assistant Deployer
item.description: Deploy a Microsoft Virtual Assistant Solution without needing to install all the prerequisite tools on your own machine

item.title: Solution Accelerator- Travel Marketplace
item.description: Decentralized, managed marketplace platform for transacting between multiple individuals or organizations.

item.title: Reusable Technology Accelerator- Tradable Digital Assets
item.description: Enable traditional assets to be easily digitalized (tokenized), exchanged as a token, and securely stored in digital wallets

item.title: Solution Accelerator- Smart Spaces

item.description: Extract business or industry specific terms from documents, such as extracting medical terms from medical documents, legal terms from contracts, or part names from engineering documents
